title: Disable "battery low" Bluetooth headphones warning on Pixel 3?
content: My Bluetooth headphones still have a 30% battery left, but now every 60 seconds my phone's lady voice tells me "battery low". This notification even cuts into media I am listening to/watching. Once every minute, that's not an exaggeration, I put a stop watch on it. Obviously this is wildly annoying. I cannot find anything on how to disable this constant warning.  Help?
